attributes.action: MAKE ILLEGAL THE USE OF THE WORD 'NIGGA' ANYWHERE
attributes.additional_details:
I feel that too many people use the N-word as if it's cool. This isn't helped by all these rappers using the words in their songs influencing the younger generation. I want it so anyone can be charged for using the N-word even if it's in a song because it's a racist term and it doesn't matter whether your black, white etc. It's still racist.
Sign this petition so we can put a stop to this disgusting word being used freely without a price.
